verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees. <S%H4609><s%> Out of the depths <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4615><s%> have I cried <S%H7121><s%> unto thee, O LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Lord, <S%H136><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice: <S%H6963><s%> let thine ears <S%H241><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> attentive <S%H7183><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications. <S%H8469><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> thou, LORD, <S%H3050><s%> shouldest mark <S%H8104><s%> iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> shall stand? <S%H5975><s%>
But <S%H3588><s%> there is forgiveness <S%H5547><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee, that <S%H4616><s%> thou mayest be feared. <S%H3372><s%>
I wait for <S%H6960><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> doth wait, <S%H6960><s%> and in his word <S%H1697><s%> do I hope. <S%H3176><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> waiteth for the Lord <S%H136><s%> more than they that watch <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8104><s%> for the morning: <S%H1242><s%> I say, more than they that watch <S%H8104><s%> for the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> hope <S%H3176><s%> in <S%H413><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> there is mercy, <S%H2617><s%> and with <S%H5973><s%> him is plenteous <S%H7235><s%> redemption. <S%H6304><s%>
And he <S%H1931><s%> shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> his iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>
